package-manager.name: pkgadd
package-manager.title: top like display of PostgreSQL performance
package-manager.description: Ptop is top clone for PostgreSQL. Similar to top, ptop allows you to monitor PostgreSQL processes. It also allows you to: * View currently running SQL statement of a process. * View query plan of a currently running SELECT statement. * View locks held by a process. * View user table statistics. * View user index statistics.
